nodes.text: A New Hope (French: Un nouvel espoir) is a junior novel adaptation of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. A New Hope was written by Catherine Kalengula and published by Hachette Jeunesse on August 23, 2017.

A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away.…
Luke Skywalker joined the Rebels to fight the Empire, with the help of Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi. Can they save Princess Leia and destroy the Death Star?
